content: crochet baby cardigan and hat this beautiful little set matches with my baby jump suit pattern to make a lovely gift make with variegate or solid colours the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** finished size approx - 18 chest 3 - 6 month baby level intermediate copyright ©2021 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-baby-cardigan-hat/
